about_the_game:
Please note: Please do not purchase the current version temporarily, as the installation package content is not yet comprehensive, the AI strategy has not been tested, and the art optimization work for the game interface, scene, and game units has not been fully completed. We will cancel the current reminder once sufficient progress has been made in all aspects of our work.

Single player, chess game, 3D, turn based, strategy game.

Based on historical data of the Korean War, authentically restore war scenes, campaign units, weapon systems, equipment and tools, and AI strategies.

The player will command the Chinese army and complete a total of 68 battles from October 24, 1950 to August 13, 1953.

——

Based on the actual geographical data at the time of the war, realistically restore 3D combat scenes.

Based on historical data, accurately restore the units, troop numbers, and equipment quantities of both sides in the battle.

Based on historical data, there are about 20 types and over 140 pieces of weapons and equipment configured.

AI will take different response actions based on the player's different tactical strategies.
